subject: Football
Sex Crimes
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: A grand jury in Santa Clara County, Calif., indicted McDonald, the former San Francisco 49ers defensive lineman, on one count of rape of an intoxicated person.
snippet: A grand jury in Santa Clara County, Calif., indicted McDonald, the former San Francisco 49ers defensive lineman, on one count of rape of an intoxicated person.
